did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: University of Arizona Postage Meter correspondence 1939-1940
did.abstract: Correspondence with manufacturers, university officials, and others regarding the installation of a postage meter system. Includes price quotes and advertisements from companies such as Pitney-Bowes, Spokane Radio Company, and National Postal Meter Company.
